short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your time & boost productivity by blocking distracting websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Site Blocker is a simple extension designed to help you maintain focus and boost productivity during your online activities. Say goodbye to distractions and time-wasting websites, and embrace a more efficient and focused browsing experience when working.

With this extension, you can easily block those tempting and distracting sites that hinder your productivity. Whether it's social media, entertainment platforms, or sports news, our extension empowers you to create a personalized blocklist of websites you wish to avoid.

Here's how it works:

Install the Chrome extension from the Web Store with just a click.
Customize your distraction-free journey by adding websites to your blocklist.
Experience uninterrupted focus as the extension effectively restricts access to the listed sites.


Join users already experiencing heightened productivity and reduced distractions. Elevate your browsing habits and unlock your true potential in every digital endeavor. 


Stay focused, stay productive!
